text:
It’s finally time for the famous momager to have her revenge! We have learned that Kris Jenner is glad almost all of her daughters are now moms and here’s why!

Kris alongside Kim Kardashian were guests on Live With Kelly and Ryan on Mother’s Day and the momager opened up about the nights her children would make her worry so much she couldn’t fall asleep.

So who was the one who kept her up at night the most?

‘Khloe for sure. Khloe would sneak out at night when she was just a teenager, and I do not think she could even drive yet,’ the Jenner recalled.

Kim went on to mention that Khloe was about 14 years old at the time.

‘She would stuff the bed so that if we peeked into the room, it looked like her,’ Kris said, adding that she would sneak out the window.

‘I would hear her music blasting. Go knock on the door—it would be locked,’ Kim remembers.

‘She was with her gaggle of friends,’ Kris chimed in.

But of course, she couldn’t get away with it forever!

‘We finally caught her. That thing never moved, and it always looked the same. I’m like, ‘I’m on to you Khloe,’’ the momager said.

That is when host Kelly Ripa told her: ‘I hope your children are just like you,’ and Kris was quick to confirm, ‘Of course! I did that to all of them. Payback is a bitch!’

As fans of KUWK know already, all of Kris Jenner’s kids, except for Kendall Jenner have at least one child of their own.

Kris also made it very clear that she adores being their grandmother but apparently, they don’t call her that.

Advertisement

‘Mason [Disick] called me Grandma but then when Kourtney got pregnant again, I thought, ‘What if I have more than one person running around shouting Grandma,’ so I decided let’s think of a name. They call me Lovey.’
title: KUWK: Kris Jenner Glad Her Problematic Daughters Have Kids Of Their Own Now – ‘Payback’s A Bi**h’
